name: MyBook
author: Arthur Ara√∫jo

sections.description:
Edit your own book. Create chapters, sections, change the order, export you book, etc.

Next version:

  • Book settings (margin, fonts, etc)
  • Multiple books
  • Multiple editors/authors
  • Export book formats

Visit: http://araujo.cc

“Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication” — Da Vinci
sections.installation: Upload the MyBook plugin to your blog, activate it, then click on the menu.
sections.changelog:
0.9.5

  • Sections bug fixed

0.9.4

  • Added section and export pages
  • Added plugin icon
  • Now the book can be exported in html and text formats
  • Fixed a 4.3.1 WordPress version bug
  • Fixed some bugs
  • Increase the compatibility

0.9.3

  • Added a remove link for each section
  • Added edit button for author box
  • Fixed a bug when the chapters didn’t have a section
